title: Texture Images
description: Analyzes texture image files (PNG, JPG, TGA) for dimensions, memory usage, and tiering compatibility. Ensures textures fit within platform memory budgets for different device tiers.

fields.title: Texture Images
fields.description: Count and analysis of all texture image files in the pack.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count of texture images

fields.title: Texture Images Tier0
fields.description: Textures assigned to tier 0 (lowest quality) for subpack-based tiering. Used on very low-end devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count or size of tier 0 textures

fields.title: Texture Images Tier1
fields.description: Textures assigned to tier 1 for subpack-based tiering. Used on low-end devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count or size of tier 1 textures

fields.title: Texture Images Tier2
fields.description: Textures assigned to tier 2 for subpack-based tiering. Used on mid-range devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count or size of tier 2 textures

fields.title: Texture Images Tier3
fields.description: Textures assigned to tier 3 for subpack-based tiering. Used on higher-end devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count or size of tier 3 textures

fields.title: Texture Images Tier4
fields.description: Textures assigned to tier 4 for subpack-based tiering. Used on high-end devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count or size of tier 4 textures

fields.title: Texture Images Tier5
fields.description: Textures assigned to tier 5 (highest quality) for subpack-based tiering. Used on premium devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the count or size of tier 5 textures

fields.title: PNG/JPG Error
fields.description: Error when a PNG or JPG image file could not be processed. The file may be corrupted or use an unsupported format variation.
fields.howToUse: Re-export the image from an image editor like Paint.net or Photoshop. Ensure you save as standard PNG-8/PNG-24 or baseline JPG without advanced compression features.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the problematic image file

fields.title: Texture Over Budget
fields.description: Error when a single texture exceeds the memory budget for its platform tier. Consider reducing texture dimensions or using compression.
fields.howToUse: Reduce texture dimensions (e.g., from 1024x1024 to 512x512) or use PNG compression. Consider using power-of-2 dimensions for better performance.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the memory size exceeding budget

fields.title: Total Over Budget
fields.description: Error when the combined memory of all textures exceeds platform limits. Reduce texture sizes or consolidate textures.
fields.howToUse: Reduce overall texture memory by: lowering texture resolutions, removing unused textures, combining textures into atlases, or implementing texture tiering with subpacks.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the total memory exceeding budget

fields.title: TGA Error
fields.description: Error when a TGA image file could not be processed. The file may be corrupted or use an unsupported TGA format.
fields.howToUse: Re-export the TGA file using uncompressed or RLE compression. Avoid TGA 2.0 extensions. Consider converting to PNG for better compatibility.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the problematic TGA file

fields.title: Atlas Over Budget
fields.description: Error when a texture that will be atlased exceeds individual size limits. Atlas textures have stricter size requirements.
fields.howToUse: Reduce the size of textures that will be combined into atlases. Individual atlas source textures typically need to be 256x256 or smaller.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the atlas texture size exceeding budget

fields.title: Atlas Budget Warning
fields.description: Warning when total atlas texture memory is approaching platform limits. Consider optimizing texture sizes.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the atlas memory approaching limit

fields.title: Atlas Budget Error
fields.description: Error when total atlas texture memory exceeds platform limits. Reduce atlas texture sizes to ensure loading on target devices.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the atlas memory exceeding limit

fields.title: Empty Image
fields.description: Warning when image processing completed but returned no usable data. The image may be empty or have zero dimensions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the empty image

fields.title: Invalid Tiering
fields.description: Error when subpack tiering configuration is invalid. Verify tier memory_tier values in manifest subpacks section.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the tiering configuration error

fields.title: Vibrant Visuals Error
fields.description: Error when tiering configuration is incompatible with Vibrant Visuals mode. Check subpack configuration.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the vibrant visuals configuration error

fields.title: Missing Texture
fields.description: Warning when a texture pack (70%+ vanilla override) is missing coverage for a vanilla texture. For complete texture packs, cover all vanilla textures.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the vanilla texture path not overridden

fields.title: Incomplete Override
fields.description: Error when a pack appears to be a texture pack but overrides less than 95% of vanilla textures. Add missing texture overrides.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the override percentage

fields.title: Mashup Incomplete
fields.description: Error when a mashup pack's global resource pack overrides less than 60% of vanilla textures. Mashups should provide comprehensive visual theming.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the override percentage for mashup
